title: Prosperr.io Secures $4M To Scale AI Tax Platform
description: Prosperr.io, a Bangalore-based fintech SaaS company building AI-powered tax management infrastructure, has raised $4M in seed funding. The round was led by Jungle Ventures, with participation from Yatra Angel Network, Sadev Ventures and other strategic investors. This brings Prosperr.io’s total capital raised to $5.55M since its founding in 2022.`This investment underscores Jungle Ventures’ high-conviction strategy of backing high-calibre, second-time founders and experienced industry operators who bring deep domain expertise and executional maturity. The firm partners with founders building foundational infrastructure layers in fintech, commerce, energy and enterprise software—sectors where Jungle has backed industry-defining companies now exceeding USD 15 billion in cumulative enterprise value across global markets.Founded by Manas Gond and Dev Kumar, both with engineering backgrounds, Prosperr.io is tackling one of fintech’s most persistent blind spots—the operational complexity of managing tax in increasingly fragmented and global financial environments. As individuals earn across multiple income sources and businesses expand across jurisdictions, tax compliance has struggled to keep up. For salaried individuals, Prosperr.io is building an always-on taxation platform that adapts to the user’s financial goals, unlocking eligible deductions with proactive adviser communication. Prosperr.io also offers tax-saving employee allowances and simplified employee reimbursement using automation and artificial intelligence for enterprises, which enables them to proactively support the financial well-being of their workforce.“We’re building Prosperr.io as the AI-powered financial operating system for working India,” said Manas Gond, CEO and Co-Founder, Prosperr.io. “Our integrated Flexi Benefit Plan and Super Saver Plan are transforming how businesses and individuals handle tax, savings, and compliance. With 3x YoY revenue growth, this round accelerates our AI and product roadmap to serve millions with smarter, more compliant financial solutions,” he added.The company recently expanded its enterprise product suite with an AI-powered reimbursement solution to address the growing complexity of corporate tax operations.“Tax is one of the most under-innovated layers of financial infrastructure, and the complexity only compounds as individuals earn across multiple streams and businesses operate global workflows,” said Rishab Malik, Partner, Seed Investments, Jungle Ventures. “Prosperr.io fits squarely into Jungle’s thesis of backing founders who are solving deep, structural problems with strong technical insight. Their ability to embed AI directly into compliance, deduction, and reimbursement workflows is creating a new category of tax infrastructure for both individuals and enterprises.”Since its previous funding round, Prosperr.io has delivered 5x revenue growth while expanding its product suite across both B2B and B2C segments, and currently maintains 80% retention across its consumer business and 100% retention across enterprise clients.The company plans to use the new funding to accelerate product development and strengthen its B2B sales infrastructure as the company scales its enterprise platform and expands into new markets like wealth management and other adjacent business lines.

title: Helium AI launches tools for businesses to help build presentations and marketing campaigns
description: Enterprise-grade AI operating platform Helium AI by Neural Arc has launched two new AI systems – Mantis and Prism. The company claims that these tools will offer a significant upgrade to its platform capabilities. Designed to streamline fragmented workflows across presentations and marketing, these tools will allow organisations to create professional, brand-aligned assets at scale, faster than ever before. title: You Can Still Search DuckDuckGo Without AI. Here’s How to Do It.
description: Recently, I began a trial run—I could hardly call it an experiment... with a straight face—of replacing all my Google usage with DuckDuckGo and seeing how my sanity fared. Well, it fared well enough that I’ve kept right on using it. title: Kodiak AI Target of Unusually High Options Trading (NASDAQ:KDK)
description: Kodiak AI, Inc. (NASDAQ:KDK – Get Free Report) was the recipient of some unusual options trading activity on Monday. Investors acquired 9,853 call options on the company. title: Opendoor Expands To Every Zip Code In America In Record Time Using AI: 'This Is Why Every Major Business Is Excited About AI,' Says Anthony Pompliano
description: iBuying platform Opendoor Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:OPEN) has rolled out its Cash Plus service to nearly every ZIP code in the U.S. in just a matter of weeks, underscoring the scale and speed unlocked by its recent adoption of artificial intelligence.Opendoor’s AI-Driven Nationwide ExpansionOn Monday, Opendoor's new CEO, Kaz Nejatian, drew a sharp contrast between the company's early growth years and its latest push. Its initial expansion, limited to just a small cluster of ZIP codes, unfolded over a period of 10 years, while its recent nationwide rollout was completed in about 10 weeks, a shift he attributed to the company's growing use of artificial intelligence.See Also: AI Bubble Fears Grow, But Investors Say Valuations Are Powering Next Wave Of InnovationIn fact, as recently as last week, Opendoor was active in only a limited set of key markets, whereas today its services span nearly the entire country, with just a few gaps remaining in between.Opendoor, which aims to simplify home ...Full story available on Benzinga.com
